sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const Dashboard = ({ user, onLogout }) => { // Mock data for dashboard const accounts = [ { id: 1, name: 'Current Account', number: '****1234', balance: 25430.50, currency: 'USD' }, { id: 2, name: 'Savings Account', number: '****5678', balance: 15750.25, currency: 'USD' } ]; const recentTransactions = [ { id: 1, description: 'Online Transfer - John Smith', date: '2025-09-15', amount: -500.00, type: 'debit' }, { id: 2, description: 'Salary Credit - Company Ltd', date: '2025-09-14', amount: 5500.00, type: 'credit' }, { id: 3, description: 'ATM Withdrawal', date: '2025-09-13', amount: -200.00, type: 'debit' }, { id: 4, description: 'Online Purchase - Amazon', date: '2025-09-12', amount: -89.99, type: 'debit' } ]; const formatCurrency = (amount, currency = 'USD') => { return new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: currency }).format(amount); }; const formatDate = (dateString) => { return new Date(dateString).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { month: 'short', day: 'numeric', year: 'numeric' }); }; return (
sc
standard chartered
Straight2Bank Dashboard
{user?.name?.charAt(0) || 'U'}
{user?.name || 'User'}
{user?.email}
{/* Account Balance Cards */} {accounts.map(account => (

{account.name}

{account.number}
{formatCurrency(account.balance, account.currency)}
Available Balance
))} {/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

{/* Recent Transactions */}

Recent Transactions

{recentTransactions.map(transaction => (

{transaction.description}

{formatDate(transaction.date)}

{transaction.type === 'credit' ? '+' : ''} {formatCurrency(Math.abs(transaction.amount))}
))}
{/* Services Grid */}

Trade Services

Letters of Credit, Trade Finance, Documentary Collections

Cash Management

Account Services, Payments, Collections

Support Centre

Help, FAQs, Contact Support
); }; export default Dashboard;
